column4: hi guys, trying to 'make' postfix from source, how can i tell if the make has completed ok?
why do you want it from source ?
version 2.3 and up have much better smtp auth control, it lets you use dovecot smtp auth...
you can do that in lower versions.
thre is a guide on htlp.ubuntu.com
that explains setting up postfix and dovecot with dovecot smtp auth?
for certain that functionallity is not available below postfix 2.3 ....
I'm reasonalby certain you can. What(document)makes you think you can't
http://www.postfix.org/SASL_README.html - Dovecot SASL support is available in Postfix 2.3 and later........
boot - and select "recovery mode" from your grub menu
